long_description: Log some major miles in the women's lightweight Marmot Lexi Shorts. An easy-going design and soft yet durable fabric ensure comfort no matter what your day brings. Lightweight fabric blend offers the cool, breathable comfort of cotton plus the durability of nylon. UPF rating of 30. Button-closure waistband with comfortable drawcord. Rear yoke panel incorporates mesh fabric for ventilation. Includes hand pockets and 2 rear pockets with rip-and-stick closures. Marmot Lexi Shorts for women have a regular fit and a 10.5 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Log some major miles in the women's lightweight Marmot Lexi Shorts. An easy-going design and soft yet durable fabric ensure comfort no matter what your day brings.
